UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the AgriPredict application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching Firebase Auth UID.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

createdAt.description: The date and time the user account was created.

photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Path-based ownership enables simple security rules based on request.auth.uid == userId.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to store user profiles. Each user has a dedicated document in the `/users` collection, identified by their Firebase Auth UID. This direct path-based ownership ensures straightforward security rules and efficient data retrieval for user-specific data. This design is simple and secure.
